completeListOfAbilities.name: Quickbolt Stance
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Increases BRV based on ATK
Melee BRV attack + HP attack
Self: 4 turns Quickbolt
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+、 HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ while Quickbolt active
HP Attack、 HP Attack+ becomes Lightspeed Jab while Quickbolt、 Last Stand active

ailments.name: Quickbolt

completeListOfAbilities.desc: Stronger Lightspeed Jab (Eight)

completeListOfAbilities.name: Lightspeed Jab+
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Increases BRV based on ATK
2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Target: 2 turns DEF Down III when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
Extends own active buff duration 1 turn
Instant turn rate
Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning、 support
Returns to Lightspeed Jab after use

completeListOfAbilities.name: Stronger Lightspeed Jab++ (Eight)
completeListOfAbilities.desc: Stronger Lightspeed Jab++ (Eight)

completeListOfAbilities.name: Phantom Rush
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Increases BRV based on ATK
4-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Self: 2 turns Phantom Rush buff
Triggers Breaksight Blow (6-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack that ignores DEF; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%) when dodging attack while Phantom Rush buff active

passives.name: Quickbolt Stance Extension
passives.desc:
When using Quickbolt Stance:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Quickbolt duration +4

When using HP Attack+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage

When using Lightspeed Jab:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Target: 2 turns DEF Down III when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break

When using BRV Attack+:
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Lightspeed Jab becomes Lightspeed Jab+ (extends own buffs 1 turn; instant turn rate; does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning、 support; returns to Lightspeed Jab after use) after inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
passives.short_desc: Quickbolt Stance Extension: Boost to Quickbolt Stance

passives.name: Buffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 slightly raises ATK with active buff
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Last-Stand Rush Extension
passives.desc:
When using Last-Stand Rush:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Last Stand duration +4
passives.short_desc: Last-Stand Rush Extension: Boost to Last-Stand Rush

passives.name: Destruction Brilliance
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Destruction Brilliance: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: BRV Up Buff Longer Extension
passives.desc: When using BRV Up Buff Longer:\n • Adds effect that slightly raises own MAX BRV for 3 turns
passives.short_desc: BRV Up Buff Longer Extension: Boost to BRV Up Buff Longer

passive.name: BRV Up Buff Longer Growth
passive.short_desc: BRV Up Buff Longer Growth: Boost to BRV Up Buff Longer

passives.name: Quickbolt & Phantom Rush Buff Starting

passives.name: Phantom Rush Breaksight Blow BRV Hit Plus Force Advance
passives.desc:
When using Phantom Rush:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 6; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Moderately raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV

When using Breaksight Blow:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 8; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Phantom Rush Breaksight Blow BRV Hit Plus Force Advance: Boost to Phantom Rush
